TopicTitle: Capture Mode Positioning is Being Stored in Memory and Being Used for New Crafts/Existing Crafts Instead of Being Reset Automatically Between Scenes.

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None

How to Reproduce:

  1. Load Existing Craft Preferably in Orbit or in Space
  2. Change to Capture Mode
  3. Tap on Numpad * a few times
  4. Press Numpad - to get a good distance from the craft
  5. Change to KSC Screen
  6. Change to VAB
  7. Launch Craft
  8. Change to Capture Mode.

The distance will be the same for both crafts when the camera should reset between scenes.

Additional Information:

  • The distance and speed of the camera is maintained changing to the KSC Screen, VAB, Launch, Tracking Station craft change, Map Mode craft change.
